statements: SELECT * FROM transactions_table LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions_table WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions_table GROUP BY account_id
SELECT * FROM accounts_table ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts_table WHERE account_balance > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions_table WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions_table GROUP BY account_id HAVING average_amount > 5000

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions_table JOIN accounts_table ON transactions_table.account_id = accounts_table.account_id WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions_table GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions_table WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY account_id ASC, transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM TransactionData WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM TransactionData ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_date FROM TransactionData WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM TransactionData;
SELECT account_id, SUM(total_transactions) AS total_transactions FROM AccountUpdates GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM TransactionData WHERE account_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM AccountUpdates WHERE current_balance > 1000 AND total_transactions < 5 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM TransactionData GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount_spent DESC;

SELECT account_id, current_balance, last_updated FROM AccountUpdates JOIN TransactionData ON AccountUpdates.account_id = TransactionData.account_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM TransactionData WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT * FROM account_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_type = 'error'
SELECT account_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM account_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM errors WHERE error_message LIKE '%timeout%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM errors WHERE error_message LIKE '%timeout%';
SELECT transaction_id, log_message FROM logs WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500);
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs JOIN transactions ON transaction_logs.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id;
